price: 21. Bazali bakufi kasi bazali na bomoyi te, mpe bayebi te mokolo nini bakosekwisama.
arabic: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
